description: Main entry point and core widget setup for the Flutter-based Blue Collar Connect app. It initializes providers, manages onboarding/authentication flow, and sets up the primary tab navigation interface, along with various screen stubs for jobs, applications, messaging, profile, and settings.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectRoot
classes.description: Root widget that sets up global providers and initializes the app.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectApp
classes.description: Main app widget setting up themes, light/dark mode, and the initial home screen.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Root widget managing authentication state and onboarding flow.

classes.name: AuthScreen
classes.description: Placeholder authentication flow for demo login.

classes.name: TabbedMainShell
classes.description: Main navigation structure with bottom tabs for core app sections.

classes.name: JobsScreen
classes.description: Screen displaying list of jobs fetched from backend.

classes.name: JobDetailsScreen
classes.description: Detailed view of a job, allows applying.

classes.name: ChatDetailScreen
classes.description: Enhanced chat view with message sending and real data.

classes.name: ChatBubble
classes.description: Visual widget for individual chat messages.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for various widgets, setting up UI and navigation.

methods.name: _sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a message in chat.

methods.name: _buildMessageInputBar
methods.description: Constructs the message input UI component.

methods.name: _buildProfileOption
methods.description: Helper to create options in the profile settings.
